input_text:
Job Title: Entry Level Sales

Location: Charlotte, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Entry Level Sales – Townsquare Interactive

This position requires you to work in our Charlotte Uptown office**

About Townsquare Interactive

At Townsquare Interactive, we specialize in empowering small and medium-sized businesses to thrive. Our stellar business management platform enhances customer flow, ensuring ongoing success. From comprehensive business management software to website design, SEO, social posts, and reputation monitoring – we have all your digital needs covered. Our mission is to simplify success for businesses of all sizes.

The Inside Sales Representative Opportunity

As a vital member of our Inside Sales Team, your role is to connect with small and medium-sized businesses across the nation, offering our business management platform and digital marketing solutions. Your responsibilities include identifying, cold calling and qualifying prospects, conducting comprehensive needs analyses, delivering virtual demonstrations, and securing new clients.

Responsibilities

Manage the sales pipeline and achieve individual and team sales goalsConduct thorough needs analyses to identify prospects' pain points and showcase our customized solutionsConduct virtual demonstrations to effectively communicate our offeringsCultivate new business opportunitiesNo Account Management required – our dedicated onboarding and service team takes care of that!

Qualifications

Proven track record of achieving sales quotasDemonstrated success in growing new businessDrive and competitiveness to surpass sales goals and advance your careerExceptional presentation, interpersonal, and communication skillsBA/BS degree (preferred)

Benefits

Competitive base salary with UNCAPPED commission plan3 weeks PTO9 paid holidays (including 2 personal/floating holidays)Volunteer Time OffHealth, Dental, and Vision InsurancePet Insurance401(K) Retirement Plan with Company MatchEmployee Stock Purchase PlanCompany-provided laptopComprehensive training and growth opportunitiesUnlimited growth potential in a dynamic work environment

TOWNSQUARE MEDIA BROADCASTING, LLC MAINTAINS A DRUG-FREE WORKPLACE AND IS AN EQUAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER. APPLICANTS MUST BE ELIGIBLE TO WORK IN THE U.S.

Townsquare Media provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, Townsquare Media complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training. Townsquare Media expressly prohibits any form of workplace harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status. Improper interference with the ability of Townsquare Media’s employees to perform their job duties may result in discipline up to and including discharge.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.summary: Inside Sales Representative Opportunity at Townsquare Interactive

job_responsibilities: Manage the sales pipeline and achieve individual and team sales goals
Conduct thorough needs analyses to identify prospects' pain points and showcase our customized solutions
Conduct virtual demonstrations to effectively communicate our offerings
benefits: Competitive base salary with UNCAPPED commission plan
Unlimited growth potential in a dynamic work environment
